reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and is made of good quality material, with one customer noting it's a light mixed soft opaque blend. They appreciate its flattering silhouette, particularly how it hides the tummy, and one mentions it gives a curvy silhouette. The dress is comfortable and true to size, though some find it runs small. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Game changer for those looking for a waist!
items.body: I want to start by saying that Iâ€™m on a fitness journey and up to now every dress I was trying on for my special event made me feel like I looked like a â€œpregnant toddlerâ€-aka meno post chemo belly. This dress however was a total game changer. Iâ€™m 5â€™2â€; 180 pounds and ordered both the L and XL. The L fit but much form fitting and looked great with uncomfy shape wear. The XL draped nicely and did well with my everyday high rise boy shorts briefs. I went with the XL for the comfy win! Paired this with rhinestone kitten heels and I felt glamorous and slim!! Holy moly this dress gave me a waist and reflective of the few pounds I have shed. It was a total motivator to keep showing up to my workouts. Hugged in all the right places and was ankle length on me with my 3 in heels. If you are thinking of getting this dress -do it and you will love it!! I added a little flower brioche for a little color. Cannot begin to tell you how many compliments I received and how gorgeous I felt in the dress. Itâ€™s a light mixed soft opaque blend material that looks high quality for this price. The off the shoulder has that silicone strip that locks the look in off the shoulder with no slipping. I wore a strapless bra but honestly could have done a regular bra and just slipped the straps down due to that silicon strip. Very comfortable and very flattering. Read more
items.author: Pat G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant Evening Gown
items.body: This is an excellent evening gown at this price point. I ordered a medium based on my height (5'3") and weight (145) per the sizing chart. The gown fits perfectly. The material is higher quality than I expected and it comfortable to move in. The dress style is flattering on me and it is elegant overall. Read more
items.author: Stephanie L. Morton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars What you see is what you get!
items.body: I ordered this for my sonâ€™s wedding. It worked out perfectly! It hid everything I hate about my body! It was very easy to de-wrinkle. I wet a towel down, tossed it in the dryer for 20min on low, checked it, no wrinkles! Very well made, nice material. I think it suggested I get a large, but if I had, I wouldâ€™ve been swimming in it. The medium fit perfectly! Read more
items.author: Kristie7515@gmail

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress
items.body: This is a beautiful dress and made very well. It wasn't flattering on my body, but that's not the fault of the seller. Would recommend to those who aren't short waisted and who don't carry weight in the tummy area. Read more
items.author: Dana Hill

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfortable

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Off Shoulder Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Off Shoulder Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Pink, Purple, Burgundy, Royal Blue, Black, Navy Blue, Cinnamon Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
